Notes: A falling lava meteor that creates a lava pool when it lands. Touching the meteor will burn the player. The pool will disappear after three seconds and the meteor will reappear again later on.

Obj_arg0.Name: First Appearance Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: The delay in frames before the actual meteor appears. Default is 0.

Obj_arg1.Name: Pause Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: How long the object remains invisible until it appears again. Default is 0.

Obj_arg2.Name: Upwards Distance
Obj_arg2.Description: The Y-offset from which the meteor falls down. Default is 2000.

Obj_arg3.Name: Falling Time
Obj_arg3.Description: How long it takes for the meteor to fall down. Minimum should be 15. Default is 180.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
